intro: Dyschoriste linearis var. schiedeana, commonly known as the narrowleaf dyschoriste, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. This species is often found in dense vegetation and plays a role in local ecosystems by supporting pollinators and providing habitat for small animals.
